locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: The top agents from the hit shows, Selling New York and Selling LA, share with us their favorite properties in this one-hour special. We go coast-to-coast to visit some of the country's most beautiful and unique residences. There's a home for every taste because these properties are as eclectic and varied as our agents.
imdb.title: The Best Place I Ever Sold
akas: The Best Place I Ever Sold (United States)
plot: The top agents from the hit shows, Selling New York and Selling LA, share with us their favorite properties in this one-hour special. We go coast-to-coast to visit some of the country's most beautiful and unique residences. There's a home for every taste because these properties are as eclectic and varied as our agents.::Scott Mouro
